table_caption: Sample size estimation per treatment arm. Sample size estimation was lowest for DSEG and PSMD in the sporadic SVD cohorts SCANS and RUN DMC. DSEG and MD median required the lowest minimum sample size in CADASIL.
table_foot: RCT = Randomized controlled trial, MD Median = Mean diffusivity Median of the WM histogram, PC1 = Scores of the first principal component, PSMD = Peak width of skeletonized mean diffusivity, DSEG θ = Diffusion tensor image segmentation θ, Geff = Global efficiency network measure.
